title: Distance (mi) to Substance Use Treatment (SUT) facility
name: SutMinDis
description: Euclidean distance* from tract/zip centroid to nearest SUT service location, in miles
construct: Access to Substance Use Treatment Programs
source_long: U.S. Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration Treatment Locator, 2020
comments: This dataset includes all US states, Washington D.C., and Puerto Rico. It does not include the territories Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, American Samoa, Palau. Zip code and tract centroids are not population-weighted.
